alert.note: Alert for Harper; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 5:45PM CDT until July 14 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Woods County in northwestern Oklahoma... East central Harper County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northern Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 545 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Selman, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Selman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
